answers.option: Hybris provides 5 extension templates: springmvcstore, soapspring, flexstore, storetemplate and yempty
Extension templates should be defined in the localextensions.xml
The following command can be used to create a new extension: ant genext
An extension can contain upper case characters

questions.question: When a the command "ant extgen" is executed by default the directory "custom" will be used. How can this be changed?

answers.option: The project.properties in extgen can be updated.
answers.explanation: Property:extgen.extension.path. This property can be overloaded in the local.properties.

answers.option: The webroot of an extension is configured in the project.properties
The manager class can be defined in the extensioninfo.xml
The location of the items.xml can be configured in the extensioninfo.xml
The package root of an extension can be configured in the extensioninfo.xml
The package root of an extension can be configured in the project.properties
The prefix of generated classes can be defined in the project.properties.
answers.explanation: It can be configured in the extensioninfo.xml. By default it is "Generated"

answers.option: Precompilcation of the JSP's can be configured in the extensioninfo.xml
